text.tspan: TO DO THIS
WITH TEXT
TO DO THIS
WITH TEXT
ABOUT THIS WEBSITE
This website was built almost entirely using SVG, and only the essential parts of HTML and CSS.
No more being constrained by the limits of HTML and CSS.
Now, by using vector graphics programs like Inkscape, you too can design websites faster than
ever, for free, in real-time, with more creative freedom, without using website builders and other
proprietary visual design programs.
These programs cost money to use features, which in my opinion should be free.
No more website builders - just clean SVG, HTML, CSS and JavaScript that YOU own.
Using this approach to making websites also enables you to shift website hosts without being
locked down in THEIR ecosystems.
USING SVG ALLOWS US
WHILST KEEPING IT SELECTABLE ON WEBPAGES!
TO DO THIS
WITH TEXT
TO DO THIS
WITH TEXT
